item.title: SAG-AFTRA Confronts a Fran-less Future
item.description: Plushie-toting union boss Fran Drescher is riding off into the sunset after four years. But the race to replace her will be a referendum on her tumultuous tenure — and on the bruising strike she helpe

item.title: SAG-AFTRA Members Settle Lawsuit Against Union Health Plan Over Data Breach
item.description: The lawsuit alleged that members are at increased risk of identity theft and fraud after a data breach in which their personal information, including names, social security numbers and health insuranc

item.title: Fran Drescher Won’t Seek Another Term as SAG-AFTRA President
item.description: After four years in charge, Fran Drescher will not seek another term as president of SAG-AFTRA. Drescher’s decision has been known within the union for some time. But it was made official on Fri

item.title: Fran Drescher Won’t Seek Another Term as SAG-AFTRA President
item.description: After four years in charge, Fran Drescher will not seek another term as president of SAG-AFTRA. Drescher’s decision has been known within the union for some time. But it was made official on Fri

item.title: Fran Drescher Won’t Run for SAG-AFTRA President As Candidates Line Up for Race
item.description: A list of national political candidates at the union, released Friday, confirmed that the labor group’s erstwhile strike leader is not seeking reelection.

item.title: Fran Drescher Won’t Run for SAG-AFTRA President As Candidates Line Up for Race
item.description: A list of national political candidates at the union, released Friday, confirmed that the labor group’s erstwhile strike leader is not seeking reelection.

item.title: Sean Astin to Run for SAG-AFTRA President, Fran Drescher a Question Mark for Another Bid (Exclusive)
item.description: The ‘Lord of the Rings’ star will be campaigning alongside secretary-treasurer hopeful Michelle Hurd and Joely Fisher, who is targeting L.A. Local president.
